text: janavo to khara! Ke akaso ane dharatinum sarjana kone karyum? Akasa manthi pani kone varasavyum? Pachi tenathi harya-bharya, sundara bagica banavya, te bagica'ona vrksone tame kyareya upajavi sakta na hatam, sum allahani sathe bijo ko'i pujya che? Jo ke a loko pathabhrasta tha'i jaya che (satya margathi)
